summary: This mod does not replace the vanilla "Fortify Destruction" it adds a completely new enchantment called "Elemental Focus" that increases your destruction magic damage.  No fancy scripts just pure simplicity ;)
descriptionHtml:
I made this enchantment for my char cause i was sick of pathetically low magic damage, especially on high difficulty levels it takes ages to kill something even with expert spells. Now finally magic can counter a well smithed weapon :) which gives a reason to play pure mage again.

This mod does not replace the vanilla "Fortify Destruction" it adds a completely new enchantment called "Elemental Focus" that increases your destruction magic damage.

Ring is disenchantable ofc ;)

------------------------------------
How to get the enchantment:
------------------------------------

"Ring of Elemental Mastery" can be crafted at smithing forge under "Jewelery" section

Materials:

1 Gold Ring
1 Filled Black Soul Gem
author: DrOuroboros
